verses.verse: Now it came <WH1961> about in the thirtieth <WH7970> year, <WH8141> on the fifth <WH2568> [day] of the fourth <WH7243> month, <WH2320> while I was by the river <WH5104> Chebar <WH3529> among <WH8432> the exiles, <WH1473> the heavens <WH8064> were opened <WH6605> and I saw <WH7200> visions <WH4759> of God. <WH430>
(On the fifth <WH2568> of the month <WH2320> in the fifth <WH2549> year <WH8141> of King <WH4428> Jehoiachin's exile, <WH1546>

the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> expressly <WH1961> to Ezekiel <WH3168> the priest, <WH3548> son <WH1121> of Buzi, <WH941> in the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> by the river <WH5104> Chebar; <WH3529> and there <WH8033> the hand <WH3027> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> upon him.)

And as I looked, <WH7200> behold, <WH2009> a storm <WH9370> wind <WH7307> was coming <WH935> from the north, <WH6828> a great <WH1419> cloud <WH6051> with fire <WH784> flashing <WH3947> forth <WH3947> continually and a bright <WH5051> light <WH5051> around <WH5439> it, and in its midst <WH8432> something like glowing <WH2830> metal <WH2830> in the midst <WH8432> of the fire. <WH784>

And within <WH8432> it there were figures <WH1823> resembling <WH1823> four <WH702> living <WH9130> beings. <WH9130> And this <WH2088> was their appearance: <WH4758> they had human <WH120> form. <WH1823>
Each <WH259> of them had four <WH702> faces <WH6440> and four <WH702> wings. <WH3671>
And their legs <WH7272> were straight <WH3477> and their feet <WH7272> were like a calf's hoof, <WH3709> <WH7272> and they gleamed <WH5340> like burnished <WH7044> bronze. <WH5178>
Under <WH8478> their wings <WH3671> on their four <WH702> sides <WH7253> [were] human <WH120> hands. <WH3027> As for the faces <WH6440> and wings <WH3671> of the four <WH702> of them,

their wings <WH3671> touched <WH2266> one <WH802> another; <WH269> their [faces] did not turn <WH5437> when they moved, <WH1980> each <WH376> went <WH1980> straight <WH413> <WH5676> <WH6440> forward. <WH6440>

As for the form <WH1823> of their faces, <WH6440> [each] had the face <WH6440> of a man, <WH120> all four <WH702> had the face <WH6440> of a lion <WH9030> on the right <WH3225> and the face <WH6440> of a bull <WH7794> on the left, <WH8040> and all four <WH702> had the face <WH6440> of an eagle. <WH5404>

Such were their faces. <WH6440> Their wings <WH3671> were spread <WH6504> out above <WH4480>; <WH4605> each <WH376> had two <WH8147> touching <WH2266> another <WH376> [being,] and two <WH8147> covering <WH3680> their bodies. <WH1472>

And each <WH376> went <WH1980> straight <WH413> <WH5676> <WH6440> forward; <WH6440> wherever <WH413> <WH834> <WH8033> the spirit <WH7307> was about to go, <WH1980> they would go, <WH1980> without <WH3808> turning <WH5437> as they went. <WH1980>

In the midst of the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> there was something that looked <WH4758> like burning <WH1197> coals <WH1513> of fire, <WH784> like <WH4758> torches <WH3940> darting <WH1980> back <WH1980> and forth among <WH996> the living <WH9130> beings. <WH9130> The fire <WH784> was bright, <WH5051> and lightning <WH1300> was flashing <WH3318> from the fire. <WH784>
And the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> ran <WH7519> to and fro <WH7725> like <WH4758> bolts <WH965> of lightning. <WH965>

Now as I looked <WH7200> at the living <WH9130> beings, <WH9130> behold, <WH2009> there was one <WH259> wheel <WH212> on the earth <WH776> beside <WH681> the living <WH9130> beings, <WH9130> for [each of] the four <WH702> of them.

The appearance <WH4758> of the wheels <WH212> and their workmanship <WH4639> [was] like sparkling <WH5869> beryl, <WH8658> and all four <WH702> of them had the same <WH259> form, <WH1823> their appearance <WH4758> and workmanship <WH4639> [being] as if <WH9201> one wheel <WH212> were within <WH8432> another. <WH212>
Whenever they moved, <WH1980> they moved <WH1980> in any <WH702> of their four <WH702> directions, <WH7253> without <WH3808> turning <WH5437> as they moved. <WH1980>
As for their rims <WH1354> they were lofty <WH1363> and awesome, <WH3374> and the rims <WH1354> of all four <WH702> of them were full <WH4392> of eyes <WH5869> round <WH5439> about. <WH5439>

And whenever the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> moved, <WH1980> the wheels <WH212> moved <WH1980> with them. And whenever the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> rose <WH5375> from the earth, <WH776> the wheels <WH212> rose <WH5375> [also.]

Wherever <WH5921> <WH834> <WH8033> the spirit <WH7307> was about to go, <WH1980> they would go <WH1980> in that direction. <WH8033> And the wheels <WH212> rose <WH5375> close <WH5980> beside <WH5980> them; for the spirit <WH7307> of the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> [was] in the wheels. <WH212>

Whenever those went, <WH1980> these went; <WH1980> and whenever those stood <WH5975> still, <WH5975> these stood <WH5975> still. <WH5975> And whenever those rose <WH5375> from the earth, <WH776> the wheels <WH212> rose <WH5375> close <WH5980> beside <WH5980> them; for the spirit <WH7307> of the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> [was] in the wheels. <WH212>

Now over <WH5921> the heads <WH7218> of the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> [there was] something like <WH1823> an expanse, <WH7549> like the awesome <WH3372> gleam <WH5869> of crystal, <WH7140> extended <WH5186> over <WH5921> <WH4605> their heads. <WH7218>

And under <WH8478> the expanse <WH7549> their wings <WH3671> [were stretched out] straight, <WH3477> one <WH802> toward <WH413> the other; <WH269> each <WH376> one <WH376> also had two <WH8147> wings covering <WH3680> their bodies <WH1472> on the one <WH376> side <WH1992> and on the other. <WH2008>

I also heard <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of their wings <WH3671> like the sound <WH6963> of abundant <WH7227> waters <WH4325> as they went, <WH1980> like the voice <WH6963> of the Almighty, <WH7706> a sound <WH6963> of tumult <WH1999> like the sound <WH6963> of an army <WH4264> camp; <WH4264> whenever they stood <WH5975> still, <WH5975> they dropped <WH7503> their wings. <WH3671>

And there came <WH1961> a voice <WH6963> from above <WH5921> the expanse <WH7549> that was over <WH5921> their heads; <WH7218> whenever they stood <WH5975> still, <WH5975> they dropped <WH7503> their wings. <WH3671>

Now above <WH4480> <WH4605> the expanse <WH7549> that was over <WH5921> their heads <WH7218> there was something <WH1823> resembling <WH1823> a throne, <WH3678> like lapis <WH68> <WH5601> lazuli <WH68> <WH5601> in appearance; <WH4758> and on that which <WH1823> resembled <WH1823> a throne, <WH3678> high <WH4480> <WH4605> up, [was] a figure <WH1823> with the appearance <WH4758> of a man. <WH120>

Then I noticed <WH7200> from the appearance <WH4758> of His loins <WH4975> and upward <WH4605> something <WH4758> like glowing <WH2830> metal <WH2830> that looked <WH4758> like fire <WH784> all <WH5439> around <WH5439> within <WH1004> it, and from the appearance <WH4758> of His loins <WH4975> and downward <WH4295> I saw <WH7200> something <WH4758> like fire; <WH784> and [there was] a radiance <WH5051> around <WH5439> Him.

As the appearance <WH4758> of the rainbow <WH7198> in the clouds <WH6051> on a rainy <WH1653> day, <WH3117> so <WH3651> [was] the appearance <WH4758> of the surrounding <WH5439> radiance. <WH5051> Such <WH1931> [was] the appearance <WH4758> of the likeness <WH1823> of the glory <WH9202> of the Lord. <WH3068> And when I saw <WH7200> [it,] I fell <WH5307> on my face <WH6440> and heard <WH8085> a voice <WH6963> speaking. <WH1696>
